definition: cave/natural cavern (in limestone)
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And I'm not climbing at Longdong, either.
sentences.chinese: 而且我也不要去龍洞攀巖。

sentences.english: In the aspect of practice, a particular analysis on Longdong Gou watershed in Mao County is given.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐方面，論文以茂縣龍洞溝爲例，進行具體分析。

sentences.english: Black Dragon Cave is a flat cave.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍洞是一平臥式洞穴。

sentences.english: So Puff that mighty dragon sadly slipped into his cave.
sentences.chinese: 神龍帕夫悲傷地游回龍洞。

sentences.english: It takes thousands of years to form a stalactite cave.
sentences.chinese: 龍洞的形成，要經歷上千年的時間。

sentences.english: I like the Shuanglong Hole because it is very cool in summer.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡雙龍洞，因爲在夏天的時候很涼爽。

sentences.english: The Longdong Nunnery hidden in pines and cypresses, backs on to the mountain and faces south.
sentences.chinese: 龍洞庵背依高山，坐北面南，掩映於蒼松翠柏之中。

sentences.english: The Huanglong Cave Scenic Spots in Zhangjiajie, the main performance site of the Country Music Week.
sentences.chinese: 張家界黃龍洞景區，音樂節開幕式主會場，風景秀麗。

sentences.english: Dragon Cave is a free adoptables site.
sentences.chinese: 龍洞是一個可免費領養龍蛋的網站。

definition: Laoshan district of Qingdao city 青島市|青岛市, Shandong
manger

temple/ancestral shrine/CL:座[zuo4]/temple fair/great imperial hall/imperial
Dulan county in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
caravan of horses carrying goods
Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Wusu city in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
Qingyuan prefecture level city in Guangdong
Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]
Nan'ao Island in Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2], Guangdong
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1 sha1 jiang1] in Lijiang Naxi autonomous county 麗江納西族自治縣|丽江纳西族自治县[Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Yunnan
